Classes

class  Capability
 
struct  Capability::Parameters
 

Detailed Description

Author
Hannes Bibel bibel.nosp@m.@in..nosp@m.tum.d.nosp@m.e

DESCRIPTION

This is the base class for all capabilities. A capability models what an agent can do, such as moving or lifting weights. Every class inheriting from this base class should also contain a nested struct called "Parameters", which inherits from Capability::Parameters.

Definition in file capability.h.
